title: Where can i check the current rotating gamemode?
body: I've googled it and it brings me to the announcement of the rotating gamemode, the last post was 4 months ago, I cant find it anywhere on the website or the forums, Is there an easy link to see what it is? I dont have access to the client right now.

replies.body: I'm love seeing others that enjoy our new game modes ^_^! When they first came out, it was a little hard to keep track of if you weren't on the client. But now, each time we release [**patch notes**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-76-notes#patch-rotating-game-modes) they will have a section detailing what the new rotating game mode is, as well as a little run down of how it works!
